info.name: API_test
info.description:
**#Introduction**  
This is introduction to project

#**Prerequisites**  
These are prerequisites

#**Setup**  
Here you can find project setup

exec: pm.test("API responds within the expected treshhold", () => {
// set the response time in milliseconds
pm.test("API response contains the expected header", () => {

body.raw:
{       "name": "Item1",
        "description": "This is a description of todo Item1",
        "activation_date": "{{$timestamp}}",
        "repeat": "weekly",
        "status": "not completed"
}

request.description:
POST request for creation of new item in todo list. Request body consists of 5 properties:
- "name" - name of new item
- "description" - short description of to-do item
- "activation-date" - date when item becomes visible to user
- "repeat" - occurence schedule of created item (daily, weekly, monthly,...)
- "status" - status of the item in to-do list (completed, not completed)

response.name: Create request

body.raw:
{       "name": "Item1",
        "description": "This is a description of todo Item1",
        "activation_date": "{{$timestamp}}",
        "repeat": "weekly",
        "status": "not completed"
}

response.body:
{
    "name": "Item1",
    "description": "This is a description of todo Item1",
    "activation_date": "1674758042",
    "repeat": "weekly",
    "status": "not completed",
    "_id": "63d2c79a07307e03e8c75ecf"
}

exec: pm.test("API response contains the expected header", () => {
pm.test("API response contains the expected header", () => {

body.raw:
{       "name": "Item1",
        "description": "This is a description of todo Item1",
        "activation_date": "{{$timestamp}}",
        "repeat": weekly",
        "status": "not completed"
}

request.description: Property "repeat" in request body is missing " before value

        "description": "This is a description of todo Item1",
        "activation_date": "{{$timestamp}}",
        "repeat": weekly",
        "status": "not completed"
}
